sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The U.S. has approved the use of controversial cluster bombs in Ukraine despite over 100 countries banning their use.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and his Turkish counterpart hold talks in Istanbul to discuss Russia's war in Ukraine, NATO membership and the Black Sea Green Deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The U.S. says it will provide controversial cluster bombs to Ukraine despite them being banned in over 100 countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: American national security adviser Jake Sullivan said the U.S. would not leave Ukraine defenseless and said Kyiv had promised to use them carefully.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So clearly a capability that would be useful in any type of offensive operations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I would note that the Russians have already been employing cluster munitions on the battlefield, many which include a very high dud rate, reportedly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Many EU countries have signed up to a treaty that prohibits them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And some member states, like like Germany say they're unacceptable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The US announcement was part of a military aid package for Ukraine worth 735 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and his Turkish counterpart Recep Tayyip Erdogan

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: held talks in Istanbul on Saturday over NATO membership, the Black Sea Green Initiative and Russia's war in Ukraine. Both Zelensky and Erdogan want to extend the United Nations and Turkey brokered agreement, under which Russia has allowed Ukraine to continue shipping grain to global markets through the Black Sea. The deal is set to expire on the 17th of July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Dutch government led by Prime Minister Mark Rutte resigned on Friday after failing

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: to secure a deal within the four-party coalition over measures to curb migration. It is no secret that the coalition partners think very differently about the migration policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And today, unfortunately, we have to draw the conclusion that those differences are irreversible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The coalition has been divided from the day it was sworn in, with the centrists opposed verplichtbaar zijn. De coalitie is afgesloten van de dag, was gezworven, met de centraal-opvang van een strik krakkeraak op migratie en conservaties, gehouden door Rutte, die moesten moeilijkere maatregelen hebben.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Migratie, maar ook als financiën.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We zijn niet meer de zuinige landen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Het volgende kabinet hoogachtige politieke kleur tot meer data is gekomen. Dat is mijn wens dat het volgende kabinet hoogachtige politieke kleur tot meer data zal komen. Swedish city of Malmö for its 68th edition next year. Sweden's third largest city, which also

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: hosted the event in 1992 and 2012, was picked in what organizers called a strong bid process, examining venues, accommodations for visitors, infrastructure and other factors. In May, Sweden won its seventh Eurovision title with the power ballad Tattoo by singer Loreen, who also won in 2012. The 2024 Eurovision grand final will be held on May 11th at the Malmö Arena.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: French football star Kylian Mbappé is honoured to visit his father's native Cameroon,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: he told reporters in Yaoundé on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mbappé, the star forward of Paris Saint-Germain and captain of the French national team, arrived in the country on Thursday for a trip devoted to charity work and a visit to his father's village.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He was greeted by hundreds of cheering fans with traditional dancers performing in his honor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Friday, Mbappé visited his school for deaf and hard of hearing children before setting off the next day to the island of Djibale.
